title: Ether rallies more than 6% as meme mania tries to reenter the crypto market
description: A surge in popularity of crypto's newest memecoins helped drive transactions on the Ethereum network.

title: Warren Buffett's successor Greg Abel is wooing shareholders, but some questions remain
description: While Berkshire shareholders have grown more confident in Abel's capabilities, some key questions about the eventual succession linger.

title: Here's where the jobs are for April 2023 — in one chart
description: See which sectors gained, and lost, the most jobs in April.

title: PacWest stock jumps 80% as regional banks rebound on Friday, but still down sharply for the week
description: Friday's rally for stocks like PacWest and Western Alliance made a dent in the week-to-date losses

title: Biden: Say goodbye to job growth and low unemployment if the debt ceiling isn't lifted
description: Biden used the stronger-than-expected April jobs number to warn of economic catastrophe if the debt limit isn't raised.

title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has been a fortress stock during recessions and bear markets. Here's how
description: The stock is known as a safe haven during turbulent times.

title: What Warren Buffett is buying in Japan's Berkshire Hathaway look-alikes
description: Warren Buffett says he sees elements of his own Berkshire Hathaway conglomerate in the Japanese trading giants that he recently upped his stock investment in.

title: CDC will have less data to track Covid and new variants after public health emergency ends
description: The U.S. has a fragmented health-care system where the authority to decide what disease data gets reported largely rests with corporations, not the CDC.

title: Trump deposition in E. Jean Carroll rape defamation case released in court
description: The deposition of former President Donald Trump was released a day after lawyers for E. Jean Carroll rested their case at a federal civil trial in New York.

title: Why Porsche is investing $100 million on eFuels to keep its cars on the road
description: How can Porsche maintain a connection to its illustrious heritage and brand identity in the EV era? The answer might be something called eFuel.

title: WHO declares end to Covid global public health emergency
description: The end of the emergency comes more than three years after the WHO first issued the declaration  in January 2020.

title: Apple and fintechs like Robinhood chase yield-hungry depositors as Fed rate hikes continue
description: The jump in interest rates coupled with the regional banking crisis has presented a big opportunity for fintechs to provide high-yield products.

title: Job growth totals 253,000 in April, beating expectations even as the U.S. economy slows
description: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase by 180,000 in April, according to Dow Jones.

title: Apple posts record quarter in India; analyst says Cook eyes market to be bigger than China
description: Apple has positioned India as a key market for iPhone sales as well as manufacturing as it looks to reduce its reliance on China.

title: Central bank gold demand hits first-quarter record, investments surge on U.S. banking turmoil
description: Demand for gold among central banks notched a first-quarter record high in the three months to the end of March.

title: Warner Bros. Discovery reports big overall loss even as streaming turns a profit
description: Warner Bros. Discovery's streaming business turns profit for the first time ever

title: Tesla hikes price of high-end Model S and Model X in China by roughly $2,750
description: Tesla raised the prices by 19,000 Chinese yuan ($2,749) across all versions of the Model S and Model X cars.

title: China's service sector remains a bright spot as factory data disappoints, Caixin reading shows
description: The reading suggests that services activity is still "undergoing a fast recovery," according to Wang Zhe, senior economist at Caixin Insight Group.

title: HSBC shareholders to vote on whether to spin off Asia business at Friday's annual meeting
description: Taking center stage for investors will be two resolutions tabled by investor Ken Lui, which call for a spinoff of HSBC's Asia business and fixed dividends.

title: King Charles' scaled-back coronation set to cost the UK up to $125 million
description: The eyes of the world will be on the U.K. this weekend as King Charles III is crowned at Westminster Abbey in a quintessentially British display of pomp and pageantry.

title: Consumers in China are dining at nicer restaurants — even if it costs $500 a person
description: "The pandemic ... affected consumers, and now they're more likely to want to treat themselves," said Tang Yan, a Black Pearl representative.

title: Hong Kong's IPO market expected to rebound in 2023, but the biggest one so far flopped in its debut
description: Hong Kong's IPO market is set for a rebound after being among the worst-performing markets in 2022 but a recent debut flop of a Chinese company dampened hopes.
